entries.text: #0After opening to door to their abode
Heh heh heh... What seems to be the ruckus?
Ooh, my! Your face.
The face of the curse.
It's an Undead.
An Undead has come to play. Heh heh...
They all end up here, all the ones like you.
You spoke to that kind old dear, didn't you? Heh heh...
You're finished.
You'll go Hollow.
Yes, you will become one of them.
Hollows prey upon men, feast upon their souls.
This is the fate of the cursed. Heh heh heh...
What is your name?
#0After the protagonist enters their name
At least you know your own name.
Here's your reward for sharing.
It's a Human Effigy.
Take a closer look...
Who do you think it's supposed to be?
Think back, deep into your past.
Yes, it's an effigy of you.
#0After the protagonist finalizes their true self
All people come here for the same reason.
To break the curse.
You're no different, I should think?
Hmm... doesn't stand a chance.
Well, you never know!
Go through the door and trot along to the kingdom.
But remember, hold on to your souls.
They're all that keep you from going Hollow.
Oh, I'll fool you no longer...
You'll lose your souls... All of them. Over and over again.
#0Talk-1st time
You must go, on a journey without rest.
Well...I suppose, if you find yourself at an impasse...
But if your will is yet unbroken, then you may return here.
To start again, with a clean slate...
Hah hah hah...
#0Talk-2nd time
Now, go along, go along... Heh heh...
#0Talk-After the protagonist has leveled up their character in Majula
Still determined as ever, I see... Heh heh...
Do you wish to start all over again?
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after acquiring the King's Ring
Still holding up, are you?
Go on, take these. Heh heh...
#0Menu-Choose "Reallocate points" without having acquired a Soul Vessel
Oh, but you don't have what's needed.
Well, that won't do at all!
Go along, then. Old hags don't bargain, dearie... Heh heh...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing something
No, of course not.
Now, go along then... Heh heh...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after using a Soul Vessel through "Reallocate points"
Now, go along.
On a journey without rest. Heh heh...
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
Hah hah hah...
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Hah hah...
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time
Tisn't easy being old...
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
A touch under the weather, are we?
#0After approaching her while hostile, after the protagonist leaves & returns
Hah hah hah...
#0Upon dying
Hah hah hah...
##You've seen the mark upon your flesh.
##The sign of the Undead...symbol of the accursed.
##Your flesh will decay, your mind will fade. But you won't ever die.
##Surely you can tell me your name.
##If you remember it, that is. Heh heh...
##It's somebody that you know very well.
##Go on, look closer, closer still.
##Now, it's just about our bedtime.
##Go on, out the door.
##Be nice...
##Hah hah hah...
